Class Square

    • geometri.AbstractForm

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GeometricalForm, java.lang.Comparable<GeometricalForm>

    public class Square
extends Rectangle
    A class that represents a Square and have the ability to draw it on a JApplet or a JFrame.
    Author:
    Albin Bååw, Kristoffer Ek
